special-structuresync: The name of the special page
structuresync-overview: Navigation tab label for overview section
structuresync-export: Navigation tab label for export section
structuresync-import: Navigation tab label for import section
structuresync-validate: Navigation tab label for validate section
structuresync-generate: Navigation tab label for generate section
structuresync-diff: Navigation tab label for diff section
structuresync-tab-overview-subtext: Short description shown under the Overview tab label
structuresync-tab-export-subtext: Short description shown under the Export tab label
structuresync-tab-import-subtext: Short description shown under the Import tab label
structuresync-tab-validate-subtext: Short description shown under the Validate tab label
structuresync-tab-generate-subtext: Short description shown under the Generate tab label
structuresync-tab-diff-subtext: Short description shown under the Diff tab label
structuresync-overview-summary: Summary text for the overview page
structuresync-overview-hero-description: Hero section subheading describing the overview
structuresync-overview-quick-actions: Heading for the quick actions list
structuresync-overview-quick-actions-sub: Short subtitle shown under the quick actions heading
structuresync-overview-categories-subtit: Subtitle for the category coverage card
structuresync-overview-no-categories: Empty-state message when no categories exist
structuresync-categories-count:
Display count of categories. Parameters:
* $1 - number of categories
structuresync-properties-count:
Display count of properties. Parameters:
* $1 - number of properties
structuresync-label-categories: Short label used for category metric cards
structuresync-label-properties: Short label used for property metric cards
structuresync-label-last-change: Label for timestamp of last structural change
structuresync-label-last-generation: Label for timestamp of last successful generation
structuresync-label-schema-hash: Label for stored source schema hash (trimmed)
structuresync-label-not-available: Fallback label when no data is present
structuresync-badge-available: Badge text when an item exists/is healthy
structuresync-badge-missing: Badge text when an item is missing
structuresync-badge-review: Badge text when attention is required
structuresync-badge-clean: Badge text when no manual edits are detected
structuresync-export-schema-preview: Header text for schema preview section
structuresync-export-copy: Button text to copy schema to clipboard
structuresync-import-created:
Number of items created. Parameters:
* $1 - count
structuresync-import-updated:
Number of items updated. Parameters:
* $1 - count
structuresync-import-unchanged:
Number of items unchanged. Parameters:
* $1 - count
structuresync-import-posthint-generate: Message shown after successful import suggesting next steps
structuresync-import-inprogress: Progress message shown during schema import
structuresync-import-no-schema: Error message when no schema is provided
structuresync-import-error:
Error message for import failure. Parameters:
* $1 - error message
structuresync-ratelimit-exceeded:
Error message when rate limit is exceeded. Parameters:
* $1 - maximum operations per hour
structuresync-import-inprogress: Progress message shown during schema import
structuresync-import-no-schema: Error message when no schema is provided
structuresync-import-error:
Error message for import failure. Parameters:
* $1 - error message
structuresync-ratelimit-exceeded:
Error message when rate limit is exceeded. Parameters:
* $1 - maximum operations per hour
structuresync-generate-tip: Short helper text encouraging validation before generation
structuresync-generate-all: Option to generate for all categories
structuresync-generate-success:
Success message after generation. Parameters:
* $1 - number of categories successfully processed
* $2 - total number of categories
structuresync-generate-inprogress: Progress message shown during artifact generation
structuresync-generate-processing:
Progress message for individual category. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
structuresync-generate-no-categories: Error message when no categories match the filter
structuresync-generate-error:
Error message for generation failure. Parameters:
* $1 - error message
structuresync-diff-apply: Button text to apply changes from diff
structuresync-error-no-smw: Error message when SemanticMediaWiki is not installed
structuresync-error-no-pageforms: Error message when PageForms is not installed
structuresync-error-circular-dependency:
Error message for circular dependency. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
structuresync-error-missing-category:
Error message for missing category. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
structuresync-error-missing-property:
Error message for missing property. Parameters:
* $1 - property name
structuresync-permission-denied: Error message when user lacks permissions
structuresync-log-name: Name for the StructureSync log shown in Special:Log
structuresync-log-header: Description header for the StructureSync log
